description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The sequel to the critically acclaimed Halloween Scream. It is two years since you became a vampire. A new lead beckons... can you succeed against all odds and lift the family curse?
description.short: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Halloween Scream. It is two years since you became a vampire. A new lead beckons... can you succeed against all odds and lift the family curse?
